    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from pandas import IntervalIndex
    4: import pandas._testing as tm
    5: 
    6: 
    7: class TestPickle:
    8:     @pytest.mark.parametrize("closed", ["left", "right", "both"])
    9:     def test_pickle_round_trip_closed(self, closed):
   10:         # https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/35658
   11:         idx = IntervalIndex.from_tuples([(1, 2), (2, 3)], closed=closed)
   12:         result = tm.round_trip_pickle(idx)
   13:         tm.assert_index_equal(result, idx)
